column5: Just wondering how the blueberry crop is this year ? I am going up bear hunting the first week and can't wait to eat some blueberry pancakes . The blueberry crop also affects our bear hunt a little too. Thanks
The berries are pretty good this year. Not as good as last year, but there's plenty for pancakes and muffins! (which we've enjoyed every day for the past 3 weeks).
Blueberries are fine. Maybe not as big as last year, but plenty of them to be found.
